Cubic v1.1.3 11 Aug 2016
- unlimited level submenu supported
- submenu enhanced for mobile

Cubic v1.1.2 29 Jul 2016
- new submenu supported

Cubic v1.1.1 14 Apr 2014
- fixes for navigation issue on mobile
- fixes for scroll position on mobile
- new smooth header transition
- new improved design & typography
- new parallax background method

Cubic v1.1.0 16 Oct 2014
- new portfolio page layout
- new social icon with color
- now button can do page scroll (before only mainmenu)
- new 'view all post' button on blog section
- fixes for overlay issue on portfolio item
